item.title: TidyTuesday: Global Plastic Waste (Mis)Management
item.description: After viewing the dataset, I have a couple of questions in mind. Here is the analysis code Which country produces the most plastic waste? I imagine it related two at least two factors, income level, and population. Generally I hypothesis the richer and more people you have, the more plastic waste your produce. Base on this question, I think I should first plot plastic waste per person against GDP per capita, see the relationship, may need log transfer, and add population as point size.
